name: Asian-Inspired Cucumbers with a Kick
author: lutzflcat
summary: Get a taste of the Orient with these quick and easy cucumbers which have nice presentation and a little kick of heat to make them interesting. Serve as a side salad or a main course by adding some chicken or grilled shrimp.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons minced fresh ginger root
2 tablespoons chopped peanuts, or to taste
½  jalapeno pepper, seeded and sliced, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Whisk rice vinegar, lime juice, honey, ginger, peanut butter, garlic, sesame oil, red pepper flakes, and sriracha sauce together in a small bowl to make dressing
Slice red onion into spirals with a spiralizer fitted with a straight-flat blade
Spiralize cucumbers into thin, curly ribbons; snip into serving-size lengths with kitchen shears or a knife
Drizzle dressing over onion and cucumbers; mix gently to combine
Garnish with peanuts and jalapeno pepper
